org.jgentleframework.context.aop
Interface ConstructorFilter

All Superinterfaces:
Filter<MethodConstructorMatching<java.lang.reflect.Constructor<?>>>, RuntimeSupportFilter<MethodConstructorMatching<java.lang.reflect.Constructor<?>>>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDefinitionMatcherPointcut.DefinitionMatcherConstructorFilter
public interface ConstructorFilter
extends RuntimeSupportFilter<MethodConstructorMatching<java.lang.reflect.Constructor<?>>>

Filter that restricts matching of a pointcut or introduction to a given set of target Constructor.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com

Field Summary
static ConstructorFilter TRUE
          Canonical instance of a ConstructorFilter that matches all constructors.

 boolean matches(MethodConstructorMatching<java.lang.reflect.Constructor<?>> matching)
          Perform static or dynamic checking whether the given method matches.If the RuntimeSupportFilter.isRuntime() method returns true, a runtime check on this method call) will be made.

boolean matches(MethodConstructorMatching<java.lang.reflect.Constructor<?>> matching)
Perform static or dynamic checking whether the given method matches.If the RuntimeSupportFilter.isRuntime() method returns true, a runtime check on this method call) will be made.
